title: Fruit of the Loom Women's Plus Size Ponte Open Front Long Cardigan
features: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry low, low iron

Women's plus size open front long cardigan
description: Seek No Further by Fruit of the Loom provides you with must have, essential pieces for every woman’s wardrobe. This collection is designed to be a system- Every piece in this collection is meant to be mixed and matched or to be paired with other staples in your closet! Contemporary fashion and effortless styles that make you feel good. This collection helps you create your style, your way and makes it easy to look your best no matter the occasion. Our plus size ponte open front long cardigan is designed for versatility. This cardigan gives you a flattering shape and provides extra coverage with the ¾ sleeves. Be sure to check out our seek no further styles to find your favorites!
